Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Attivita' di referaggio di lavori scientifici per le seguenti riviste: “Economic Journal”, “Economic Theory”, “RAND Journal of Economics”, “International Journal of Industrial Organization”, “Theory and Decision”, “Review of Industrial Organization”, “Telecommunications Policy”, “Bulletin of Economic Research”, “Business History”, “NETnomics”, “Manchester School” , "Australian Economics Papers", "Electronic Markets".

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Rapporto su relazioni a conferenze pre-2010

International Symposium on Communications Regulation: Net neutrality and Open Access Karlsruhe, Germany Relazione su: "The internet sector and network neutrality: where does the EU stand?" (Co-autore: Hairong Mu)

Association for the Study of Religion, Economics, and Culture Annual Conference Arlington, Virginia, USA Relazione sul lavoro: “Home Bias and Religious Attitudes” (Co-autori: Martin Leroch, Gianpaolo Rossini, Eugenio Zucchelli)

Searle Annual Conference on Internet Search and Innovation Northwestern University School of Law Chicago, USA Relazione sul lavoro: "Net neutrality and innovation at the core and at the edge" (Co-autore: Tommaso Valletti)
Jornadas de Economia Industrial Univeristy of Valencia Valencia, Spain Relazione sul lavoro: "Net neutrality and innovation at the core and at the edge" (Co-autore: Tommaso Valletti)

Centre for Competition and Regulatory Policy Workshop City University London London, United Kingdom Relazione sul lavoro: "The fight against cartels: a transatlantic perspective" (Co-autori: Emilie Dargaud e Andrea Mantovani)

MaCCI Mannheim Centre for Competition and Innovation Annual Conference Mannheim, Germany Relazione sul lavoro: "The fight against cartels: a transatlantic perspective" (Co-autori: Emilie Dargaud e Andrea Mantovani)
European Association for Research in Industrial Economics (EARIE) Annual Conference Evora, Portugal Realzione sul lavoro: "Location choice in the spokes model" (co-autore Mark Lijesen)
Royal Economic Society Annual Conference Parte del Comitato Organizzativo Locale (Responsabile: Prof. Denise Osborne)

International Industrial Organization Conference Northwestern University, Chicago, USA Relazione sul lavoro: "The fight against cartels: a transatlantic perspective" (scritto con Emilie Dargaud e Andrea Mantovani)
Network of Industrial Economists Winter Meeting Co-organizzatore (con Mario Pezzino, Michal Krol e Paul Madden)
Royal Economic Society Annual Conference Parte del Comitato Organizzativo Locale (Responsabile: Dr. Ralf Becker)

Jornadas de Economia Industrial University of the Balearic Islands, Palma de Mallorca Relazione sul lavoro: "Market competition and firms' specialization choices: an application of the spokes model to the Dutch car repair market" co-autore Mark Lijesen

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Descrizione dell'attivita' didattica presso atenei stranieri: University of Manchester (United Kingdom) University of York (United Kingdom) Singapore Institute of Management/Manchester Business School (Singapore)

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Research grant on: "Behaviour-Based Price Discrimination in Multiproduct Markets" Principal Investigator: Rosa Branca Esteves (University of Minho, Portugal) Co-Investigators: Carlo Reggiani, Andrew Rhodes (University of Toulouse, France) Consultant: Prof. Mark Armstrong (University of Oxford, United Kingdom) Funding: Portuguese Science Foundation (FCT), 14680 euros (Ref: EXP/IIM-ECO/1615/2013)

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: International Journal of Industrial Organization Best Paper Award 2015 Descrizione: This prize is awarded to the best two papers published in the International Journal of Industrial Organization each year. We are delighted to announce the winners of the 2015 award (for papers published in 2014): Measuring unilateral effects in partial horizontal acquisitions By Duarte Brito, Ricardo Ribeiro, and Helder Vasconcelos, published in volume 33 (2014) 22–36. Elasticity of demand and behavior-based price discrimination By Rosa-Branca Esteves and Carlo Reggiani, published in volume 32, Pages 46-56 (January 2014).
